rule: General themes must not be listed in any section labeled for them.
input: Industry experts discussed the landscape with no mention of overarching themes, just specific techniques.
output:
Company names: 
People names: -||-
Specific topics: Analysis, Techniques, Landscape
General themes: Insights, Discussion, Expert Opinions
evaluation:
The output provided does not comply with the desired format specified in the description. According to the desired format, the output should contain a list of company names, people names, specific topics, and general themes. In this case, the "Company names" and "People names" sections are empty. While it is possible that there were no company or people names in the provided input text, we are only evaluating for compliance with the output format. Empty sections without any indication that there were no relevant entities fail to meet the specification requirements as it stands.

Additionally, the "Company names" field does not have any placeholder or comment indicating there were no company names, unlike other list fields using "-||-," which creates inconsistency with the desired format.

ERR
